Beer With Geeks 112: Writing on Glass

24 Jun 2016
Beer With Geeks Podcasts

Friend of the show Damon joins Tim and Frank again to talk about everyone’s favorite “comedy”: The Martian! The novel, the movie, they talk about it all. Cheers!
